Label.en: But the efforts of Victor Hugo, and his novel in 1831, the Hunchback of Notre Dame, changed public opinion!

Label.en: A public fund was set up, and it was fixed and renovated..
Label.fr: A public fund was set up, and it was fixed and renovated..
Label.es: A public fund was set up, and it was fixed and renovated..
Label.zh: A public fund was set up, and it was fixed and renovated..

Label.en: It remained without major incidents all the way up until 2019!
Label.fr: It remained without major incidents all the way up until 2019!
Label.es: It remained without major incidents all the way up until 2019!
Label.zh: It remained without major incidents all the way up until 2019!

Label.en: While doing some small renovations, it caught fire... burning the famous spire and ''forest'!

Label.es: While doing some small renovations, it caught fire... burning the famous spire and ''forest'!
Label.zh: While doing some small renovations, it caught fire... burning the famous spire and ''forest'!

Label.en: Luckily, the main structures are still intact
